perturbation.original_text:
REVENUES
     4.1  plan_b  shall  pay  LICENSOR  a  share of its revenues as set forth in
          APPENDIX  2  ("REVENUES").
perturbation.changed_text:
REVENUES
     4.1  plan_b  shall  pay  LICENSOR  a  share of its revenues.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the reference to Appendix 2 for defining revenue share, while Appendix 2 still discusses the specific percentages, creates ambiguity and a potential for disagreement on the actual revenue split. Section 4.1 now implies revenues will be shared but offers no clear direction on how to calculate the share, directly contradicting Appendix 2.
